titleStmt.title: A nevv booke of spirituall physik for dyuerse diseases of the nobilitie and gentlemen of Englande, made by William Turner doctor of Physik
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the vaticane church, by Marcus Antonius Constantius. Otherwyse called, thraso miles gloriosus [i.e. Egidius van der Erve]],

notesStmt.note: The place of publication and printer's name (from colophon) are false; in fact printed in Emden by Egidius van der Erve.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Marcus Antonius Constantius. Otherwyse called, thraso miles gloriosus [i.e. Egidius van der Erve]]
